cause.description:
Rights for all is this not CANADA THE LAND OF THE FREE.
1. Let people Live there life the way they want .Be it Bi,Straight ,Gay and that what goes on behind closed doors sexually should be no one elses business. Clubs like swingers groups and strip joints should be allowed to open anywhere as long as they follow
cause.mission: To teach people not to judge.
cause.name: Open Your Minds
